title: F00T Metal Jacket R0T8
description: This will run a perfect lap in F00T Metal Jacket R0T8, give it a thumbs up and replay it X times. Your vehicle must be in position #1 at the start. Race: https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/job/gtav/NE7ngh7u9UWxJQewBrSINw

setup.description: 1) Bookmark the job from one of the links at https://www.reddit.com/r/gtaglitches/comments/1pyottp/improved_insane_rp_exploit_3750_rp_every_1020/
